amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike language pertaining to the delayed implementation of the EPA Lead Renovation, Repair, and Painting Rule.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 27 printed in House Report 114-683 to strike language that would delay implementation of the EPA Lead Renovation, Repair, and Painting Rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cartwright amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 231 (Roll no. 429).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cartwright amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 231 (Roll no. 429).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Cartwright.
